name: UISplitViewController.SplitBehavior
desc: Constants that describe the possible ways that the child view controllers appear in relation to each other.

items.name: case automatic
items.desc: The split view controller automatically decides the most appropriate split behavior based on the device and the current app size.

items.name: case tile
items.desc: The sidebars and secondary view controller appear tiled side-by-side.

items.name: case overlay
items.desc: The sidebars are layered on top of the secondary view controller, leaving the secondary view controller partially visible.

items.name: case displace
items.desc: The sidebars displace the secondary view controller instead of overlapping it, moving it partially offscreen.
